Edges-Alchemist -- Male Human Seasoned Alchemist
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes: Young: -1 Attribute Points
Skills (12 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Fighting: (agi) d4 Science: (sma) d6
Alchemy: (sma) d10 Gambling: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Skill Notes: Young: -2 Skill Points
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 4; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (3 points): Arcane Background (Alchemist); Chemist; Master Alchemist Hindrances: Greedy+; Vow; Young Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Alchemist): Has Material Components+ feature
Greedy+: Violently insists on getting more than a fair share
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Young: +1 Benny each session
Combat
Parry: 4 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Robe With Hooded Cloak Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun (d4-2 R3"); Dagger (d6+d4 R3"); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 15
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Alchemist): 3 Powers/15 Power Points
Arcane Background (Alchemist): May make alchemical items/Concoctions given to others have specific aspects, use self Alchemy to activate, and must be used w/in 48 hr
Chemist: Concoctions given to others last 1 wk
Master Alchemist: May create potions for half cost
Material Components+: Suffers -4 arcane skill rolls when materials are unavailable; critical failure exhausts materials
